items.content_html: imgcompress is a lightweight, Dockerized image compression tool that converts HEIC from (iPhone Photos) and other photo formats to optimized JPEGs, resizes images for various use cases, and integrates seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines via a modern Web UI or CLI.

items.content_html: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.
items.title: Christopher-Totlyakov/OnlineMovieAPI: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.

items.content_html: This is a simple and interactive web application that allows users to change the background color of the page dynamically. The project is built using ReactJs, making it lightweight and easy to use. It serves as a great example of how JavaScript can manipulate the DOM to create engaging and responsive web applications.
items.title: GauravSingh696/Background-Changer: This is a simple and interactive web application that allows users to change the background color of the page dynamically. The project is built using ReactJs, making it lightweight and easy to use. It serves as a great example of how JavaScript can manipulate the DOM to create engaging and responsive web applications.
